actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 901 (a) (relating to prohibition of sex discrimination) of the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt athletic programs or activities from the prohibition of such section.

summary.text: Amends the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt from the sex discrimination prohibition provision of such Act athletic programs or activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 901 (a) (relating to prohibition of sex discrimination) of the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt athletic programs or activities from the prohibition of such section.
